newsitem.title: UK: Telewest business prices cut by up to 30 pct. [CORRECTED 11:25 GMT 12/10]
newsitem.headline: Telewest business prices cut by up to 30 pct. [CORRECTED 11:25 GMT 12/10]

text.p: Telewest Communications Plc said on Thursday it would be cutting business call prices by 10 percent on average in a bid to undercut the UK's dominant player British Telecommunications Plc

Telewest, the UK's biggest cable operator, said in a statement that from October 25 there would be a 10 percent cut in UK weekday daytime rates, with a 20 percent cut in weekday evening and night rates and a 30 percent cut in weekday daytime international rates. Telewest has already announced cuts for residential customer calls.
It said the new business rates are 10 percent (Corrects from 10 times) cheaper than BT.
